item.title: Red Hat Summit - The Future of Red Hat Network Satellite
item.description: The Red Hat Summit and JBoss World are the premier open source events to learn about the latest and greatest in open source cloud computing, platform, virtualization, middleware, and management technologies. May 3-6 2011. Red Hat Network Satellite has been successfully managing Red Hat Enterprise Linux in traditional datacenters since 2002. In that time, Red Hat Network Satellite has been extremely popular, managing groups of systems that scale from small local deployments to vast global infrastructures.
